name: First Step

description_es: Completa tu primer check-in emocional

name: Tool Explorer
description: Try 5 different tools from the library
description_es: Prueba 5 herramientas diferentes de la biblioteca

name: 3-Day Streak
description: Use the app for 3 consecutive days
description_es: Usa la aplicación durante 3 días consecutivos

name: 7-Day Streak
description: Use the app for 7 consecutive days
description_es: Usa la aplicación durante 7 días consecutivos

name: 14-Day Streak
description: Use the app for 14 consecutive days
description_es: Usa la aplicación durante 14 días consecutivos

name: 30-Day Streak
description: Use the app for 30 consecutive days
description_es: Usa la aplicación durante 30 días consecutivos

name: Breathing Master
description: Complete 10 breathing exercises
description_es: Completa 10 ejercicios de respiración

name: Meditation Guru
description: Complete 10 meditation sessions
description_es: Completa 10 sesiones de meditación

name: Journaling Enthusiast
description: Record 10 voice journals
description_es: Graba 10 diarios de voz

name: Emotional Awareness
description: Complete 20 emotional check-ins
description_es: Completa 20 check-ins emocionales

name: Gratitude Practitioner
description: Complete 5 gratitude exercises
description_es: Completa 5 ejercicios de gratitud

name: Somatic Explorer
description: Complete 5 somatic exercises
description_es: Completa 5 ejercicios somáticos

name: Emotional Growth
description: Show positive emotional shift in 5 journal sessions
description_es: Muestra un cambio emocional positivo en 5 sesiones de diario

name: Night Owl
description: Complete 5 activities between 10 PM and 4 AM
description_es: Completa 5 actividades entre las 10 PM y las 4 AM

name: Early Bird
description: Complete 5 activities between 5 AM and 8 AM
description_es: Completa 5 actividades entre las 5 AM y las 8 AM

name: Weekend Warrior
description: Complete activities on 4 consecutive weekends
description_es: Completa actividades en 4 fines de semana consecutivos

name: Tool Master
description: Try at least one tool from each category
description_es: Prueba al menos una herramienta de cada categoría

name: Favorite Collector
description: Add 5 tools to your favorites
description_es: Añade 5 herramientas a tus favoritos

name: Consistency Champion
description: Complete at least one activity every day for 21 days
description_es: Completa al menos una actividad cada día durante 21 días

name: Emotional Explorer
description: Record 10 different emotions in your check-ins
description_es: Registra 10 emociones diferentes en tus check-ins
